about_info.title: About me
about_info.description_1: I’m a 21-year-old Software Engineering graduate from Keiser University, holding a Bachelor of Science in Software Engineering, originally from Masaya, Nicaragua. I enjoy building modern web applications that combine clean design with solid functionality, working comfortably on both the front end and the back end.
about_info.description_2: I’m a fast learner who values teamwork, clear communication, and thoughtful problem-solving. I enjoy collaborating with others, taking initiative when needed, and continuously improving my skills through hands-on projects. Outside of coding, I like playing videogames, football and spending time with my friends and family, which helps me stay balanced and motivated.
